realitycheck.title: การตรวจสอบสภาพความเป็นจริง (Reality Check)
realitycheck.about: การซื้อขายออปชั่นสามารถทำให้ท่านเสพติดได้เฉกเช่นกับกิจกรรมอื่นที่มีการกำหนดขีดจำกัด เพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงความเสี่ยงต่างๆ ในการเสพติด พวกเรามีทางเลือกในการตรวจสอบเพื่อช่วยให้ท่านได้รับรายงานสรุปการซื้อขายของท่านในบัญชีต่างๆ ของท่านตามปกติ

realitycheck.session_duration: ระยะเวลาที่ใช้งาน:
realitycheck.statistics: สถิติการซื้อขายของท่านตั้งแต่
realitycheck.interval_question: โปรดระบุช่วงเวลาในการตรวจสอบที่ท่านต้องการในหน่วยนาที:

new-account-maltainvest.info: The financial trading services contained within this site are only suitable for customers who are able to bear the loss of all the money they invest and who understand and have experience of the risk involved in the acquistion of financial contracts. Transactions in financial contracts carry a high degree of risk. If purchased contracts expire worthless, you will suffer a total loss of your investment, which consists of the contract premium.
new-account-maltainvest.read_and_agreed_to: I have read and agree to the
new-account-maltainvest.general-pattern-error: Only letters, space, hyphen, period, and apostrophe are allowed.
new-account-maltainvest.length-range-error: This field must be within {{min}}-{{max}} characters.
new-account-maltainvest.maxlength_error: This field can be at most {{max}} characters long.
new-account-maltainvest.address-pattern-error: Only letters, numbers, space, and these special characters are allowed: - . ' # ; : ( ) , @ /
new-account-maltainvest.postcode-pattern-error: Only letters, numbers, and hyphen are allowed.
new-account-maltainvest.phone-pattern-error: Only numbers and spaces are allowed.
new-account-maltainvest.secretanswer-pattern-error: Only letters, numbers, space, hyphen, period, and apostrophe are allowed.
new-account-maltainvest.tax-identification-number-pattern-error: Only letters, numbers, and hyphen are allowed.
new-account-maltainvest.not-pep-verify: I acknowledge that I am not a politically exposed person (PEP)
new-account-maltainvest.pep-info: A PEP is an individual who is or has been entrusted with a prominent public function. This status extends to a PEP’s relatives and close associates.
new-account-maltainvest.other_derivatives_trading_experience: Binary options or other financial derivatives trading experience
new-account-maltainvest.other_derivatives_trading_frequency: Binary options or other financial derivatives trading frequency

authentication.documents: Authenticate your account now by verifying your identity and address. To proceed, simply send the following documents to
authentication.proof_of_identity: Proof of identity - A scanned copy of your passport, driving license (either provisional or full), or identity card that shows your full name and date of birth.
authentication.proof_of_address: Proof of address - A scanned copy of a utility bill or bank statement that's not more than three months old. Your proof of address must contain your name, address, date of issue, and the name of the issuing organisation.
